pages.text: $(philo)as an alchemist, some may envy your power, and want to take it for themselves. should you wish for some form of deterrant, a nova catalyst may be what you are looking for.$(br2)significantly stronger than mundane tnt, a nova catalyst is easily able to leave a fiery crater where an enemy once stood.
$(philo)creation of one of these charges simply involves mixing mobius fuel into the gunpowder of a mundane explosive. do note that the increased volatility means a shorter fuse length.
